website_summaries.verdict: Tops the competitors for being practical, functional, and attractive. You'd have a difficult time finding a floor lamp with more to offer.
pros: Handsome design includes stylish shelving and USB port
cons: Assembly is somewhat difficult, and the instructions aren't very helpful

customer_reviews.title: Good idea that could be great with just a few changes.
customer_reviews.text: This lamp mostly performs as expected. Stability could be better as it is a little bit on the lighter side. If the base was metal or a heavier type of wood, it would make a huge difference. Cable management could be better, either with more clips or if the USB and accessory power plugs were facing down instead of up (that would help give it a cleaner look). I would also pay a little more if one of the USB ports was USB-C (and fully compliant). The hole for the pull-chain should probably be better protected as the pull-chain will likely wear out the edges very quickly. Those are all minor issues for an otherwise good idea for lamp.
customer_reviews.author: theoverdrive

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts make it unusable. Assembly looks like a PITA
customer_reviews.text: Shipped missing 8 very unique screws that can't just be obtained at the hardware store. Seller has not yet responded to my issue and it's been a week. The box it shipped in was so tightly packed that I had to destroy the box to remove the components. Everything is modular, ready to be assembled by me which looks like it would have been quite the project even with the screws. Now I have an unusable lamp, a pile of parts in the living room, and a fun errand on my list of to-dos this week.
customer_reviews.author: dingleberry

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: These have been a very affordable option for me and my husband. We needed two bed side tables to do on either side of our bed with lamps. Our problem is that we have only one outlet in the bedroom at the other end of the room so these are perfect as they have charging stations, lamps and platforms to store things. The white also brightens up the bedroom nicely. They are lightweight and easy to put together. The only issue with them is that they are firm on our hardwood floor but they may be slightly wobbly on carpet.
customer_reviews.author: T-dawg

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete package of necessary hardware - plus, confusing instructions. Returning Package
customer_reviews.text: I have found it impossible to assemble the lamp because of missing parts. Called the seller and they promised to send a complete package of hardware, which was not received immediately as promised. After, complaining directly to Amazon support, they finally mailed a replacement package, but it also is incomplete and, all toll, even both packaged together does not match the list of necessary parts outlined on the package instruction sheet. Have to repackage bob and return for reimbursement - free shipping provided by Amazon. Very disappointed - the design is just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Lion Queen

customer_reviews.title: Good lamp--charges iphones at night and looks good
customer_reviews.text: Good lamp--charges iphones at night and looks good. Assembly took a while--many pieces and initially the shade did not set up square. Then we found out that the light bulb socket and a screw ring that needed to be tightened down and then it squared up perfectly. Directions were not in any language but were only pictures and were a bit hard to follow. After assembly we really like the lamp.
customer_reviews.author: J. Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Met high expectations
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one unit first. It arrived one day earlier than scheduled. Well packaged--no missing or broken parts, nothing was problem. It took a little time to set up, but once it's done, everything works as expected. After my satisfaction with the first order, I purchased the second one. It arrived on time and everything was as well packaged as the first one. Brightech met my high expectations for the product quality and packaging and exceeded my expectations on the early delivery of the first order.
customer_reviews.author: BBB555

customer_reviews.title: Well designed, practical, and handsome
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful lamp, perfect for smaller bedrooms where space is at a premium. The light from the linen shade is very pleasant: bright enough to read by but not glaring. I use the convenient USB plugs and electrical plug (a three-prong would have been nice, however). Assembly was relatively easy (read the instructions). The lamp is surprisingly sturdy. As first I was dismayed by the plastic shelf (the rest are wood) but it only took spilling a little coffee on it to appreciate how easy it is to clean. I will be ordering a second one of these for my daughter's room.
customer_reviews.author: Jane's daughter

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.text: We received this and right when we opened the box we realized that it was really just a bunch of junk. The outside of the box was not damaged, however things inside the box were. Among that, the sizing was way off on everything, nothing matched. The materials also seemed to be very cheaply made. We couldn't even put it fully together because of how poor everything was. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: ZBA91

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Really surprised how useful this is. Put together quickly and while it is lightweight, I will place some wall anchors along the back edge to stop a child from pulling it over. Put together in 15 minutes and placed in a an unused corner, convenient to the house entry door. So convenient to be able to place phone, keys, etc on this table lamp when entering the house. The dual charging station and one power outlet meets out needs. Probably will replaced the bulb with a WiFi capable bulb and set up an on/off smart home routine based around arrival times. Shipped quick and well packaged. Was much nicer than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp! Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I bought the lamp for a very specific area and it worked better than expected. The light is bright, diffused, and even. It lights my entire living room beautifully with a soft white glow. It was easy to assemble with just a little double-sided mounting tape to even out the shade (It comes flat so bending it to square was a bit wonky. I'm sure it will settle into the correct shape but the tape just helped. I love the USB and plug features and use them daily. It is sturdy but light and not top-heavy like I thought it might be. All in all a great lamp - I immediately bought the smaller table version, too.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Cheap materials  not sturdy broke quickly
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lamp and others similar from other makers and this Britech lamp was the cheapest made. It’s not sturdy and wobbly. It broke quickly and easily. Do not recommend if looking for quality lamp. The base isn’t wood. It’s that light plywood , the lamp shade is cheap. Our lamp broke by pulling the on chain too hard. I contacted the seller to replace or replacement part and they said it’s not covered under warranty and they cannot sell replacement parts. Since it has a charging shelf I glued the lamp I put it in the play room and secured to wall so it doesn’t fall on kids if someone bumps into it. Very light and wobbly.
customer_reviews.author: Keesha

customer_reviews.title: Lampshade Came damaged
customer_reviews.text: I bought this due to the overwhelming amount of good reviews but when I needed a simple shade replacement after the brand new lamp we unpacked and assembled had a damaged shade the customer service at Brightech was/is unresponsive. I called and they just sent me to an email that I have been going back and forward with no solution in sight. Also not sturdy at all. Made with very cheap material plus the charging ports only work if the light is on which is pointless.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: All in One
customer_reviews.text: I have really enjoyed this product. The stand was simple to put together and took no longer than thirty minutes to assemble. I bought this to help us organize our night stand, we used to have a table, lamp and a multi usb charger, it was close to the ground and I would always knock it over as I moved around at night. This product put everything together into one easy product. I like how sturdy it is, it’s not bright and I use it in the morning to help get ready without disturbing my wife with bright lights. Great Product.
customer_reviews.author: Clifton & Ana

customer_reviews.title: Extremely satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an inexpensive floor lamp for my home office that would not be "tippy", as many floor lamps are, yet have a small footprint as my space is small. This lamp fits the bill! The price was right and I found it very easy for this all-thumbs-middle-aged-woman to put together. The materials (shade and most shelves) seem to be good quality, though I was slightly disappointed that the shelf for 'plug-ins' is some kind of plastic. That may be a problem for anyone with a houseful of kids or others who are rough on furniture, but I don't expect this shelf will get much abuse in my home.
customer_reviews.author: Mom, Mum, Meme

customer_reviews.title: Plastic and wood composite
customer_reviews.text: first if your looking for any real wood look elsewhere. Cheap is an understatement. It was very easy to put together although directions are poor. The lamp value is about $30. It appears tall from photos but is only short girl size five foot two inches approximately. When I move I think I will sell it for $10. hope this was helpful. My suggestion spend a little more and get better quality, studier and made of real wood.
customer_reviews.author: Samelectrico

customer_reviews.title: Look for better
customer_reviews.text: So cheap I think $45 would be more than a fair price for this. The lamp shade looks a bit deformed Following the instructions didn't help to straighten it out The instructions say not to put more than 6 pounds on this I wouldn't put more than one pound on it Incredibly unstable and it leans forward The top of the lamp is futher away from the wall then the base of the lamp is
customer_reviews.author: Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Nice lamp but misleading advertisement
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice lamp but there is nothing "smart" about it out of the box. The title and product details states it's compatible with Alexa, Google Home, and smart outlets. Virtually everything with a plug is compatible with a smart outlet so this lamp isn't special. I believe they use the smart device tactic to make more sales and charge extra money. If you want this to be a smart lamp you'll need to purchase a smart outlet, bulb, or switch separately. You can buy a similar lamp of same quality for $30 to $40 dollars less and make it a smart device yourself. You'll get better features this way without spending an initial $75.00+ on the lamp alone.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Combs

customer_reviews.title: NICE FLOOR LAMP-GREAT FEATURES
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my son at Christmas. I ended up putting it together. I am pretty handy but I can see why some people may have had issues. I had to redo a couple of steps even after reading the instructions. Could have been me. If you want this to give off enough light for reading I don't think it's anywhere near bright enough. More for mood lighting. The only complaint is the shade. Its shipped flat in the box. When you unfold it and install you end up with three corners that are sharply square and one round.
customer_reviews.author: sandy

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: I really liked that the lamp has USB ports and shelves, it was easy to assemble and light weight but sturdy. It looks really nice in my living room with the rest of my furniture as well. The one thing I was not very happy with was that the lamp was so dim. I put a 60 watt bulb in that I thought was going to be brighter, similar to the brightness in my other lamps, but it was not. I do not want to try a higher watt bulb for fear that it will cause damage. In general, I like the lamp.
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and extremely lightweight
customer_reviews.text: These are so pretty, but the material is cheap and they don’t sit well on carpet. My one year old could easily pull them down, they are so light weight. Beware that they are not as sturdy as they look. Other than that, we love that there are ports to plunge in accessories and slots to set phones and tablets
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Functional, beautiful, a little unstable.
customer_reviews.text: Putting the lamp together wasn’t too hard. The instructions weren’t very well done, but it’s easy enough to figure out. Came very well packaged, I did not have any deformities. The only problem I have with the lamp is it’s not very sturdy on carpet. Maybe better on hard wood. It’s very light, which is both good and bad. The main focus is the functionality and look of the lamp. It scores high in both of those categories. PS: comes with a light bulb. Very bright lamp.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Great as a Nightstand for Small Spaces
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure if I would like this once I saw it in person. After putting it together which was easy and didn't take long at all. It looks really nice next to my bed and it fits perfectly, which I was worried about since I had such a small space to work with. Great for anyone else like me who needs a nightstand but has only a tiny space available to use next to their bed. Only con would be the levels of it aren't the most sturdy and can't hold too much weight. Besides that one thing it's perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin C.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic lamp stand and good value.
customer_reviews.text: I love this lamp stand. in fact I love it so much I bought 2. Set up is easy. Set out the pieces and they are easy to distinguish. Though I’d separate the 2 shorter ‘legs’ for use near the top. Material seems strong but is very light. I placed mine either side of the couch for his and hers usb slots and other electronics. I also bought smart bulbs and connected them to Alexa for easy of use.
customer_reviews.author: kas

customer_reviews.title: Not well made
customer_reviews.text: It’s pretty flimsy and the Velcro that attaches the lamp shade to the frame ripped right off when I tried to adjust it. I definitely do not like the Velcro feature. I contacted their customer service and they are at least sending me a new lamp shade so I don’t have to send the whole thing back. This is probably ok for a room in your house with not a lot of traffic and activity but I wouldn’t recommend it for a busy area in your home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and functional
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a kids playroom, not expecting much but was pleasantly surprised at the quality of the product, and relative ease of assembling. My only problem was with the shade, it was a smidge challenging to get it lined up just right around the frame and to velcro it in to keep it straight. I couldn't get it 100% perfect, but it is ok for what it is. I am very happy with the look and the usage of this item.
customer_reviews.author: H R LaConte

customer_reviews.title: Looks very cheap
customer_reviews.text: The 4 stars is only because the material is very cheap, both actual, and is noted in the look and feel. It is like a cheap plastic. It looks almost like a fake imitation plastic, like from a toddlers toy. From a distance, like ten feet away, you cannot tell. My lamp is in a corner, People don’t get close. But from close up, you can tell it looks very very cheap. I would not put this lamp anywhere that guests or clients would be close to it.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Great looking lamp for the price
customer_reviews.text: For less than $100, this is a pretty great lamp. The design and overall construction is nice, and the shelves make it really functional. I agree with other reviewers that this probably isn't the best sole source of light for an entire (large) room. The canvas top of the lamp doesn't look that nice up close, but that could be the way I put it together. For fake wood and being as light-weight as it is, it seems very sturdy so far. There are a lot of pieces that come with the assembly, but it was a very easy process-- the hardest part is putting the lampshade portion together. Overall I'd recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: ohsnapanniemac

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as an extra "charging outlet" in a room short on accessible plugs. The room's occupant can now have easy access to lighting, storage of personal items, as well as a docking port for phone and other media devices. Similar lamps purchased from other outlets were flimsy, easily breakable, and far less value for money. I intend to eventually install one in every room in my house!
customer_reviews.author: S. Fitzgibbon

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lamp perfect for charging USB and one other plug
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son’s nursery because I had a USB night light that I wanted to put on it. So I can have the brighter light when I need it and then the USB moon lamp on the first shelf when I want it quieter at night. I wish I had one of these in my office because it is perfect for resting your phone or tablet. The electrical outlet right next to the USB is such a bonus. Looks high quality and survived the moving truck, storage unit and move without getting damaged. Even the lamp shade kept it shape when it was pushed up against stuff.
customer_reviews.author: StarSculptress

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This came in a small box and was easy to assemble. I love having the outlet and USB port with some shelving for the charging devices. I also love how little space it takes up, it's perfect for tight spaces or small spaces. It's a sturdy build but easily tips over if you give it the slightest push. It does seem to dampen brightness a little but only a minor amount. I still love it though and bought another as well.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Very low Quality Lamp
customer_reviews.text: Was really disappointed, even at $70.00 the cheap particle board and plastic materials this is just not a good looking lamp. I wouldn't even have paid $29.99 had I seen this lamp in person. This will be used in a spare bedroom that no one uses. It does work and was not difficult to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Cos

customer_reviews.title: I really really like - So convenient
customer_reviews.text: I really like this stand. It's perfect if you like having a few items by your bed - clean and minimalistic. The height of the shelves are ideal, so whether you're lying in bed or sitting up against the headboard, you can put your items at a convenient reach. The conduction of the plugs work well, and it doesn't take forever to charge your laptop or phone. Fave of all is the light plug. I usually doze off at night while on my phone or book, so I love that I can just toss my phone/book onto the shelf and reach to tug the light plug while I'm already lying down - super efficient.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, works nice
customer_reviews.text: I received the box damaged on the side and was worried the whole thing was damaged. Fortunately it was ok so heads up to the people shipping this item. Do a better job in packaging it please! Easy to put together. We needed it to elevate our modem so we can get better wi-fi upstairs. The shade looks nice except it’s not flushed at the bottom where it sits. But could be easily remedied by turning the shade. Very clean look just don’t put anything heavy on the shelves as it’s a little flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: lovemydog

customer_reviews.title: Brightens Up My (Home) Life While Adding Character & Functionality!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so thrilled with this purchase! Love, love, LOVE how this floor lamp brightens up my home life! It especially brings so much character to my living room as well as gives it that tres chic look! Additionally, the USB charging port works like a charm. I have peace of mind knowing that I can charge my phone while watching my favorite TV shows and/or movies in the comfort of my living room! Customer service was absolutely amazing! A+++ :-)
customer_reviews.author: Keena Johnson

customer_reviews.title: cellphone charging/alarm cellphone ready lighting
customer_reviews.text: the ability to charge multiple devices and still be available to have a modest plug in within reach makes this just needed years ago . the dividers give spots to rest and the lamp chain gives a satisfying ker-chunk when it turns off or on . the stock bulb that came in the box still going strong almost a year good needs an upgrade but adequate, monthly clean the shade with a FRESH DUSTING TOOL FOR CLOTH SHADES.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but functional
customer_reviews.text: Nice enough lamp, would probably skip the “charging” edition though. Assembly was a bit more involved than I was expecting, but only took a few minutes. Do be aware that it is made of plastic; looks wood-like enough for casual inspection but feels a bit cheap to the touch.
customer_reviews.author: Buzz D.

customer_reviews.title: Feels cheap... It is cheap.
customer_reviews.text: Personally, I was not thrilled at the quality in this product for the price that was paid. I should have looked further into other buyers' feedback. For the height, it's very likely to fall over because it has no weight to it's body. I had to place a heavy planter on the base to give stability. The materials feel very cheap and flimsy. It's definitely not worth the price. Positive... The charge port is pretty cool, but... it's a plastic. This would be good in a teenager's room, or even a college dorm room.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp over all
customer_reviews.text: I had a helluva time trying to put this thing together since it didn’t come with instructions. Annoying. It’s not super bright, but I imagine that’s because of the lightbulb they sent with it. I’m gonna something different when it’s time to replace. All in all though, great lamp. I love the shelves and having the charging station just right there as it’s already connected.
customer_reviews.author: Clementine

customer_reviews.title: Eh.
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are NOT clear. I scrolled through pages of reviews until I finally found someone who clarified the instructions in a picture. As for the actual lamp, I like it except I don’t like that the shade floats because that means it moves and also my shade had a brown smudge on 1 side, so now so REALLY don’t want it to move. I’m not sure this was worth the cost, I see Overstock has similar models maybe that would be better.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Cool
customer_reviews.text: Love it but some of the screws were not long enough so I had to glue them. kind of a little disappointed about the screws not being long enough to put it together but what are you going to do.
customer_reviews.author: Sye

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to assemble and it does exactly what I wanted. I added a smart bulb so I could control the light with Alexa and not have to physically pull the chain every time to turn the light on. The outlet and USB plugs are a great addition and something I was looking for. The lamp shade was a bit tricky to fold together, but it turned out great.
customer_reviews.author: RV

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice and Love the Charging Shelf!
customer_reviews.text: Great Shelf Floor Lamp! Not hard to put together, charging shelf is great, lights up a medium size bedroom and has been sturdy. Just FYI...the the second shelf is 16" off floor. With mattresses cannot see alarm clock. Sitting in a chair 2nd shelf works great. (there's the base shelf, second shelf, then the charging shelf is the third shelf). Still I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Bill D

customer_reviews.title: Sort of cheap looking unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: This lamp was pretty easy to assemble, but the shade is pretty bad. It doesn’t sit level and the bulb is literally the only thing holding it on the lamp. The charger and outlet feature is nice. But if you are looking for something that looks more upscale this is not the lamp for you. I bought 2, assembled 1 and will return the other one for sure.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these in exchange for having a mere bedside table with a lamp. I saw this and thought it's a perfect all in one bed side piece. Lighting, charging docks (usb/socket), and cubbies to put my things in. The assembly was quite easy since everything was labeled and the instructions were very easy to follow. Its pretty sturdy and the materials are lightweight. It even included the lightbulb. Overall, I'm very happy with the product and recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Yhoonice

customer_reviews.title: Useful with a small footprint
customer_reviews.text: This floor lamp was easy to put together and it looks good! The light is diffused by the shade, which is great for us because it stands to the side of the tv but is not at all glaring or distracting. I came across these "tower" lamps when I was shopping for a small-footprint table lamp on-line, but most of them had no built-in electrical outlet and/or usb port like this one has. And it comes with clips to hide the electrical cord against one of the upright supports!
customer_reviews.author: Ingrid

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, charges USB devices, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these for our living room as we have ceiling light fixtures in the new house. Installed HomeKit enabled Philips Hue White & Color Ambiance BR30 Single LED Flood Light Bulbs inside each. The light diffused through the lamp shade is slightly dim for our liking but not a deal breaker. I love the USB ports that came with these. The powe socket is little hard to use as you fear you may topple the lamp altogether if yanked. Overall a good product but slight expensive for what it does. My biggest gripe is that the power cord is not planned right. It doesn’t hide well and it just hangs down from topmost shelf in your view.
customer_reviews.author: abhijeet uike

customer_reviews.title: Cheap materials
customer_reviews.text: Quality is poor. Does what I needed (small floor lamp with shelves) but it's plastic and chipboard. Definitely not worth $70. Maybe $40 on a good day.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: charges electronics too!
customer_reviews.text: this floor lamp was easy to put together with the instructions included. I have it in the guest bedroom. The USB port and outlet for a plug was the selling point for me. I also have another floor lamp that Brightech makes. It is in the family room next to my recliner, so I can charge my phone or tablet as needed. So I figured everyone has electronics that need to be charged that's why the second purchase. I am very pleased with this company and the two floor lamps that I have purchased from them.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This was fairly easy to assemble with a Phillips head screwdriver & seems pretty sturdy. My one disappointment? Most of it looks like wood. but the USB & outlet shelf is made of molded plastic in a woodgrain finish but it looks REALLY CHEESY in comparison to the rest of the shelves & poles which DO look like real wood. I personally wouldn't use it in a room where you have a lot of visitors, but it's fine for a bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Jim In Texas

customer_reviews.title: Great floor lamp.
customer_reviews.text: The floor lamp was easy to assemble and had no missing pieces. The finish on it is perfect. It looks wonderful and I added a Hue color bulb to it which with the diffuser makes for a soft, colorful display. It comes with a nice, white LED bulb so you don't need to buy a separate one like I did. I put a bluetooth speaker on the lower shelf, used the power supply on the top shelf, and used the included cable guides to route the wire to keep things looking clean. Brightech though of everything. This is a great floor lamp for an office or small/medium room.
customer_reviews.author: Harry Hugel

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, still works great after a year!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome lamps! I bought the black one a year ago. We have an older home so we need all the extra charging spaces we can get. I loved the lamp so much I just bought the Havana Brown version. They are super easy to put together and are very sturdy. I’ve used one every single day for a year without any issues. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie B

customer_reviews.title: Great design, a little flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: I set this up as a nightstand, and it's perfect except it's pretty light and not very sturdy. The light is bright enough, it looks nice, it has great room for my books, and I love the charger and outlet feature. We bought a second for the other side of the bed. I just wish it were real wood or at least a little heavier.
customer_reviews.author: Alli

customer_reviews.title: Good ambient light, great shelves
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is it's not bright at all, its more ambient lighting than real light. But I love the shelves! I love being able to charge my phone with it. It's been a perfect solution for the small space between my recliner and sectional that couldn't fit end tables. Will buy another for the other side of my couch soon, and just buy a back up light for real light
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This Little Light of Mine Makes the School Year Shine
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this light to add lighting to the dining room which is now our classroom for COVID virtual learning. My child can charge his laptop, tablet, mouse on this one light and keep some books/supplies on the shelves to keep from cluttering the dining table workspace. For the cost, it’s perfect. Really glad this little light is going to help him shine.
customer_reviews.author: K. Hedden

customer_reviews.title: I Love Lamp
customer_reviews.text: Took 15 minutes to assemble, it was very easy. This lamp is awesome. I have it behind a slanted corner of a large sectional and it lights up that while part of the room. Then I have the cords for my phone my girlfriend's phone and I charge my PS4 and Xbox controllers there. Overall it works great. I never thought I'd say I love a lamp, but I love this lamp. In short. "I Love Lamp"
customer_reviews.author: The Amazing Bear

customer_reviews.title: functionality at is best!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for small space. beware that you are not paying quality of product; rather than functionality and space saving. I love the idea but feels really cheap, like if u have kids or cats there it goes ur $100 bucks. But like I say if tou buy it this is what u get: functionality, easy to assemble and mostly functional for adults.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Estrada-Tague

customer_reviews.title: Works for my room!
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is easy to assemble and works for me as a nightstand/lamp. I shopped around and did not find a better lamp with the same features for less. The only thing I would say is that if you are looking for a bright light that will allow for reading while you're in bed, the lightbulb is not good for that. I am not sure if you can change it out.
customer_reviews.author: Jay M

customer_reviews.title: I really like this light. Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: The light is great. The shelves are sturdy. The only downside is that the shade is not sturdy. The shade is folded for transport and then you must bend it to fit on top of the lamp. It doesn't fit perfectly. However, the light looks great in my son's room and he is happy to use the charging station for his phone and ipad.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Love these lamps!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing lamps. Perfect for small spaces, a dark corner that needs light, or for that clean lines look. We are currently downsizing from big bulky dressers and bedside stands with lamps. They fit nicely beside the king size bed in our queen size master bedroom. The charging ports are a wonderful bonus! The bulbs that are included light the room perfectly. When the accent wall is painted (dark blue) These lamps will look even more amazing. I gave it 4 stars for sturdiness. They are good, but if you have pets or little kids running around, put something heavy on the bottom shelf for added weight (a stack of books etc) Enjoy!!!
customer_reviews.author: margaret e

customer_reviews.title: Great Lamp
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect addition to my living room. It offers a soft light when the overhead light is too harsh. The USB ports and plugs are very convenient. It was very easy to put together. I don't think it took more than 20 minutes ( I put it together a few months back, so I don't remember exactly). I would recommend this lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Charise Munlin

customer_reviews.title: Instructions aren't great, takes a while to build
customer_reviews.text: Pretty sure the instructions were wrong, or at least so bad i stopped looking at them and just referenced the image on the box. There are some people would prob get frustrated with it. Also with the included bulb, not a whole light of light either. Might need bump up wattage on bulb .... another design fail is the power cord runs down entire length of one of the legs (OUTSIDE) and is clipped on with cheesy clips... instead of running inside a tube like most lamps.... that's pretty cheese . Overall pretty sucky .... IMHO
customer_reviews.author: M. Thomson

customer_reviews.title: must have better quality when sent out
customer_reviews.text: The first one I bought was just right. I asked for another one. That this place said was new. It’s not it doesn’t even have Velcro on the wire that holds the shade on. And the wire frame doesn’t fit. This box was just put together to get rid of it. The stand is also white and the gave me brown plastic wire holders. Sending back for a corrected one. Hope they get it right this time.
customer_reviews.author: Mstormy

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is perfect for what I needed. I bought two for a rarely-used guest room. Fits the bill with function, look and price. My boyfriend and I had a contest of who could assemble the quickest and it was almost a tie. So definitely not hard, but you have to pay attention to the part names. I had to undo a couple parts because I was rushing and used a longer piece when I should have used the shorter one. The pull chain on one is a little sticky but is fine if you just pull hard. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia LaBelle

customer_reviews.title: Love this lamp!
customer_reviews.text: We love this lamp. Yes it is a light weight but when the bottom level is filled with coffee table books it's quite sturdy. Loved it so much we bought another!
customer_reviews.author: NJN

customer_reviews.title: Its a great lamp and the shelving is sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: We love this lamp! I was worried how tough the assembly would be and the quality based on the few negative reviews I always check out first. But am pleased to say, it was pretty easy and the unit is very sturdy. Good purchase. The bulb included is too dark for the room I want to light, its a basement, but we put in another bulb and voila! Like the good reviews, I have to state I'm VERY happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Darla Marmon

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 4 stars overall because it was easy to assemble and looks nice in the room but it isn’t very sturdy. Tightening it more sounds like it it breaking it so I’m concerned about the long term quality of it. I have young kids and I think this will break if knocked over. The shade also has a bad crease so I have to turn it so it doesn’t show.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: My second purchase
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this lamp works, so I purchased a second one. The shelf for charging my devices is really convenient. Now I have a lamp on both sides of the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Tompkins

customer_reviews.title: Correct amount of hardware (just doesn’t match the instructions)
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Turns out the correct amount of hardware was provided- it does not reflect the correct number on the instructions which made me freak out and be upset. The only comment is that the charging shelf is texturized plastic. Pretty upset - I’m about to return this if i can’t make it work. The package came with the more than 50% screws and other fasteners missing. The package of the items was opened clearly by someone digging their finger in yet the rest of the packaging was fine - so it came out of the manufacturer that way. I’ll update this if I reorder it.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Valladares

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to assemble & is perfect for bedroom night stands
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 for the bedroom. Super easy to assemble, each comes with a perfect "mellow feel" bulb, they fit perfectly in tiny corners, sturdy enough to hold: my cup of coffee, some journals & small books, and they each have 2 chargers and a 120v plug too! The lamp shade is a little eh, but I love the lighting, it is so relaxing. I am very happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: iLean

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, nice look
customer_reviews.text: Overall poor quality. The shade had some loose unraveling threads. The lamp itself was not sturdy. I really like the the shelving and charge station which are the best features. The black lamp had a wood grain look to it which matched my Pottery Barn espresso office furniture very well. Overall I’m happy with the look but not the quality. It’s not worth $90 - maybe 50 - but I don’t feel like going through the trouble of taking it apart and returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: Pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Really like this lamp - the simplistic lines and functionality. Does require some assembly - read the instructions and don't overtighten! I did accidentally strip two inserts, but was easily able to rearrange and use them in a different area - that worked fine. Have to work shade a little bit, but again, just follow the instructions and it does straighten out.
customer_reviews.author: Vyla

customer_reviews.title: Excellent light coverage and wonderful for small spaces!
customer_reviews.text: I am using this as a side table, light for a small bedroom with no space to put an end table. With this lamp, I do not mind not having an end table. This lamp does everything and more. The lamp as 2 USB ports for charging devices, as well as an outlet which I use to plug in my Amazon Echo Dot. Light source bright, and lights up the entire room, excellent for reading, etc. The only thing that I would want different, would be to have a choice of lampshades for the lamp. Other than that, this gets 5 stars from me! Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: clec1606

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts and light didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: When this arrived it was missing parts for assembly, and also there was no electric current to the night bulb socket. There are also a lot of scuff marks and dents in the shelves themselves. This would have been a great lamp for what we wanted if it actually worked and had all the parts. Very disappointing, especially for the price paid.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda M

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy and clunky design
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality. Flimsy and felt like a small breeze would knock it over. It also isn't very handsome. The quality of the material is very low. Imagine seeing this at a Walmart or big lots on clearance.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle

customer_reviews.title: I like, BUT
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is very cute and just the right light for next to the bed. I like most everything about it but its weight. I think it will tip over very easily. The bottom shelf should be made of a heavier material so it will stand more firmly; then it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: S & S

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and not too hard to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lamp for my entry. Absolutely love the look! It’s a bit to assemble but not too bad. Planning on purchasing one more.
customer_reviews.author: J Rittenhouse Salem OR

customer_reviews.title: They look great and the charging stations work well with my phones ...
customer_reviews.text: Wound up buying two of these to use in my living room. I used Philips Hue bulbs instead if the included LED bulbs. They look great and the charging stations work well with my phones and iPad. The build quality is extremely cheap, but look nice and are functional. The lamp shades take a bit of work to make square after unboxing, but I do nor regret the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Decent product for the cost
customer_reviews.text: This is not an elegant wooden lamp, but it looks the part if placed correctly. Easily assembled by my spouse. I was surprised it came with a light bulb. It was the perfect addition to create just a bit more light in the TV room. And the style is versatile. I think it's perfect in the corner of our casual room!
customer_reviews.author: Team maryland

customer_reviews.title: Practical but usb stopped after a year
customer_reviews.text: It's a little over the year and the usb ports have stopped working. It has yet to fall but the clumsy people in the house tip it fairly often. The light is nice for winding down and the shelves and grooves for electronics are practical. Just hoped it would have lasted longer
customer_reviews.author: VC

customer_reviews.title: Lots to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes i feel like these “needs assembly” products should just send some metal ore and sawdust and provide instructions to melt it down and form whatever it is we’re expected to build. So many parts to put together. In the end, though, only took about 40 minutes. Not super sturdy but does its job.
customer_reviews.author: Garr Godfrey

customer_reviews.title: I love these!
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what I needed. I ordered 2 as bedside tables. The charging station is so convenient and it saves outlet space! I swapped the includes bulbs for my smart bulbs and they work fine. Took away 1 star because quality could be better. They have the potential to tip easily which isn't great because I have cats and uneven floor, otherwise I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Menza

customer_reviews.title: looks great, works great, not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is beautiful, works great, and easy to assemble. My only con would be that it is not as sturdy as it appears. I have it on carpet in my bedroom so it may be a little bit better on hardwood so I can't speak to that. Otherwise, love the USB port and the lighting is deceivingly bright. Overall, the price seems high for how lightweight it is, but I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: Very nice lamp! Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Very nice lamp! Easy to put together, took lest than a 1/2 an hour, just need a phillips head screwdriver and that's about it. Very nice Wood like material and looks really nice too, not cheap like some of them can. Very Classy looking and lights up our office and that works out perfectly with the USB and power plug located on the top shelf. I think it will last a long time and very sturdy and for the price you can't go wrong!
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: The material vs. The Price
customer_reviews.text: It was a stretch to give it even 3 stars, but the concept is awesome... a lamp with charging ports! Especially when you live in a smaller space and need a lamp with the extra storage/decorative capacity. However, the lamp is very cheaply made and its mostly plastic and laminate wood. Moreover, I paid 80 bucks for cheap fake wood lamp that isn't sturdy at all, like it could get knocked over at any minute.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Sorace

customer_reviews.title: Nice lamp but shade is not to secure
customer_reviews.text: We got the snap for the living room attached to a light switch. The assembly was easy until getting to the lamp shade which doesn't give you much Direction on keeping the lamp shade sturdy and security. I ended up installing the included light bulb over the ring which secured the lampshade. This any instructions would be quite helpful if this is the correct way. There is no cut hole for the chain to control the light switch off and on but for are you still use an actual light switch on the wall. Overall I like it has USB switch for my phone and a holder quite handy
customer_reviews.author: Apachecanon

customer_reviews.title: For Want of a Bolt. . . .
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is beautiful. The main problem I had was I was short 1 bolt. I emailed Brightech who was very quick to respond and, then, to obtain the bolt and, ultimately to send it to me. I received it yesterday. And now the lamp is put together and I love it! I would like to put my two-cents worth in regard to the directions. They could be more clear - putting lamps together is not normally what I do. The directions are very good in detail, but there were a few things I had to make assumptions which did work out in the end.
customer_reviews.author: M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a showroom, lamp shade doesn’t connect with the base of the stand no matter how much I pressed the shade as the instructions directed. Additionally, the top of the lamp shade is uneven and when the light is on it looks ragged. Okay for my home but would not purchase again as a show piece.
customer_reviews.author: Lanae

customer_reviews.title: Really solid design, use a good bulb and dimmer switch.
customer_reviews.text: Very solid design, and with an LED bulb (100w) on a dimmable switch , I am totally satisfied. 10"x10", a little shorter than expected but ok still. The plug in on the shelf also dims through the dimmer switch. My rope light powers up and down as the LED brightness goes up and down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Number one easy to assemble took more time to find my tools than it took to put together. The lamp gives me more space to put my things next to my bed and it looks very modern and classy. The ports are very convenient since I can use them to charge my phone and power my alarm clock.
customer_reviews.author: John D. Forsythe

customer_reviews.title: Smart lamp
customer_reviews.text: Our review is in two parts. She loves the look and fit in our TV room. I liked the ease of assembly, sturdiness and instructions from vendor. A best product for the price. A similiar lamp was $179 at a local furniture stor, why. Anyway, be smart and consider this very nice lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Mac354

customer_reviews.title: Awesome style, but mine has an annoying buzz hum ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome style, but mine has an annoying buzz hum when a usb wire isn’t plugged in to suck power. Gorgeous and extremely useful with the shelves! A must have style. I’d recommend it to anyone. I would exchange it to fix my buzzing issue, as I’m sure it’s just a singular defect but not worth the trouble perhaps.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Spring

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for corner guest room light - also replaces need for night table in small area.
customer_reviews.text: We love this product that also functions as a night table in our guest room which is small and with limited space. Our recent guests appreciated the fact that there was space for a box of tissues, to place their "things" and they could charge their cell phone as well. To add stability (which wasn't necessary however it was my preference), I chose some of my favorite books for the lower shelf. Highly recommend this lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Adds much needed light
customer_reviews.text: Got this is a Christmas present for my wife. Our family room only has lights by the fireplace so we wanted something to light up the other side of the room. Works as advertised. USB charging shelf is plastic and doesn't feel particularly sturdy but I wasn't expecting solid oak. Easy to set up. Lamp shade comes folded and didn't unfold perfectly but it's not too noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus A. Toft

customer_reviews.title: The USB charging port is incredibly convenient...
customer_reviews.text: I use this lamp behind my desk in my home office, it provides a good compliment to the ceiling light. It doesn't put out a blinding amount of light, but just the right amount. Assembly was quick and easy. I love having the USB charging port, it moves some of the clutter off my desk. Solid product and highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Maranda

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to the family room
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect piece for the corner of our family room. It looks fabulous and we get so many compliments on it. We choose to use the light often rather than the overhead lighting in the room. The price was right and it was easy to assemble. Extremely pleased with this light.
customer_reviews.author: E. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great for price
customer_reviews.text: Really nice lamp! It's very easy to assemble. Thinking of getting another one, especially for the price. Works great, bulb included. I gave four stars because the lamp is basically black. The picture looked dark brown, more wood-like which is what I wanted. The lamp shade isn't the highest quality. It's nice, but you have to bend to shape, which is a pain.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Lights for a bedroom
customer_reviews.text: Nothing bad at all to say about these lovely lights that we put in our master bedroom. Because the bulbs are hidden as they have a cover underneath, it takes the bulb brightness away so you can have them close to the bed. They have cell phone ports and make it very convenient to have your phone right there instead of having to plug it elsewhere in the room.
customer_reviews.author: Shopping with Friends

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp but wrong color
customer_reviews.text: This lamp looks great and is very easy to put together. The usb shelf is going to be so perfect for charging my phone at night. The only reason I took off a star is beacuse I ordered this lamp in white which costs $10 more and I received the black version instead. Amazon refunded the difference which is nice but not as nice as it would have been to receive the color I ordered... Sorry the photo is a little dark but when I turn the lamp on it’s so bright that you can’t see the shade.
customer_reviews.author: Abos

customer_reviews.title: Great aesthetics for any space
customer_reviews.text: I love the lamps... I initially purchased 2 for my bedroom but decided to use them in my living room... It was very easy and quick to assemble however neither box came with “cushions” or washers as some would call them-although they weren’t really necessary anyway.
customer_reviews.author: A.D.

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp, well worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I was really impressed with this lamp. First of all, it was very easy to put together. I'm basically terrible at doing things like this, but it came together easily. More importantly, it really looks nice. I especially liked the charging station and shelves. The actual lamp was surprisingly bright but with a soft glow. I'm really glad I bought this, and would certainly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald E. Mack

product_meta.title: Brightech Maxwell Charger - Shelf Floor Lamp with USB Charging Ports & Electric Outlet - Tall & Narrow Tower Nightstand for Bedroom - Modern, Asian End Table with Light Attached - Black
feature_bullets: ALEXA, GOOGLE, APPLE & SMART HOME COMPATIBLE LAMP CHARGES YOUR CELL PHONES AND LAPTOP VIA USB & OUTLET - Turn your lamp on/off with Alexa or other smart devices. (Requires smart bulb and outlet sold separately.) 2 USB ports conveniently recharge your mobile devices including iPhones and Android devices. The shelf features a US electrical outlet to charge a laptop, tablet, iPad etc.

TOWER FLOOR LAMP WITH BUILT IN BOOK SHELVES MAKES A SPACE SAVING SKINNY BED SIDE TABLE OR NIGHTSTAND - Save bedroom floor space with this tall and narrow bedside table with attached lamp. Store books or other items, or pull the pullchain for a night reading light. What a practical combination!

ASIAN STYLE VERSATILE CONTEMPORARY LIGHTING SUITS BEDROOMS, LIVING ROOMS & OFFICES & A RANGE OF DECOR - The Brightech Maxwell Charger wooden end table with mood light is inspired by Japanese designs, and comes in three colors. The contemporary look given by the wood and simple lines allows it to match many decor styles including asian, mid century modern, rustic, farmhouse, country and western.

ETAGERE COLUMN FLOOR LAMP WITH 20,000 HOUR LIFE LED BULB INCLUDED: The Brightech Maxwell USB etagere lamp includes a 9.5 Watt, 800 lumen power saving bright LED bulb so that you will never have to replace a bulb. It’s advanced 3,000K warm white LED technology allows this lamp to outlast energy burning halogen or incandescent bulbs. Save money and energy with the Maxwell. Note: Bulb not dimmable.

BRIGHTECH'S 3 YEAR PRODUCT WARRANTY: We proudly stand behind all of our products 100%, which is why we offer a full 3 year warranty. If for any reason you are not satisfied with your purchase, please contact us because our number one goal is customer satisfaction and we are committed to making it right for you. Applies to products bought from Brightech (not just Brightech branded) in new condition.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars2,476 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
